about.title: About
body: I’m a software engineer with a solid background in .NET and SQL Server, plus hands-on experience with React and TypeScript. I'm learning Azure administration and have practical know-how deploying apps to IIS and similar environments. I’m currently focused on complex desktop applications and REST/SOAP API systems—maintaining, modernizing, and integrating services that keep critical workflows running.

Previously, I led teams responsible for people coordination, planning, and end-to-end project execution—experience that sharpened my communication and delivery. I bring that structure into software: connecting stakeholders, translating requirements into clear solutions, and shipping maintainable features. Curious by nature, I enjoy mentoring and continuously investing in learning across the Microsoft ecosystem.

netApiReact.description: Combined .NET backend and React Vite frontend template. Supports static build deployment through .NET’s wwwroot, or dynamic serving via Node/Vite development server.

netAPI.title: .NET API
netAPI.description: Web app with React frontend and .NET API on backend. Calling API getData collects from spacex-api all the data and inserts in SQL Server db using EF Core. Returns data from local db. React shows all data with enabled filtering, pagination and favourites. Favourites are made for session.
